document_data.name: Melt Metal
document_data.mainbody: '''''Melt metal''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[wu jen]] in [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell allowed a wu jen to heat up and melt metal. During casting, the wu jen touched a piece of metal and magical energy flowed into it. The spell only affected metal objects. A wu jen's total focus was required to cast this spell.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], a gem valued at least 20 [[ch'ien]].
